ai-mil5.4.10:3.2_0: In the same way, the Realized One and Brahmā Sahampati fell into the air and chasmed him with confidence in the Realized One. Then they brought him up to him, saying: ‘The Buddha is preserve, lord of death.’

ai-mil5.4.10:4.2_0: In the same way, the Realized One and Brahmā Sahampati fell into the air and chasmed him with confidence in the Realized One. Then they brought him up to him, saying: ‘The Buddha is preserve, lord of death.’
ai-mil5.4.10:5.1_0: Or more when his students agrees to give alms-food and his preceptor, he chooses his preceptors to them, calls them out of confidence in his preceptor, and he gives them a preceptor.
ai-mil5.4.10:5.2_0: In the same way, the Realized One and Brahmā Sahampati were rebuked him with his own hands, and he proclaimed them, saying: ‘The Buddha is free of all suffering.’”
ai-mil5.4.10:5.3_0: “Good, sir, would you agree with such a dragon?”
ai-mil5.4.10:8.1_0: (In this way) he spoke the ten questions in accordance with the Teaching.
